description: Created Python notebook exercises and lectures to teach AI testing methodologies, focusing on fairness, robustness, explainability, and scalability.
Applied tools like AI Fairness 360, EvidentlyAI, Foolbox, SHAP, MLflow, and JMeter for comprehensive AI model evaluation and monitoring.
Designed workflows for ethical AI testing and human-in-the-loop feedback using Hugging Face Transformers and custom annotation pipelines.
Contributed to the successful launch of a corporate website, aligned with the company's requirements
Ensured the website's compliance with SEO best practices, resulting in improved search engine ranking
Improved website load time by 20% resulting in a 15% increase in user engagement.
Enhanced user engagement and communication by setting up a user-friendly "Contact Us" form, integrated with Mail SMTP for seamless communication
